homePage.introduction: I am an Information Technology Engineer, passionate about creating impactful digital experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Information Technology Engineer with Mexican-U.S. nationality. One semester away from graduating at the Polytechnic University of SLP. Specialized in Full Stack development and data analysis with a focus on innovative solutions.
about.exp1_desc: Development of enterprise applications with Vue.js/Vuetify and creation of interactive dashboards with Power BI for real-time data analysis.
about.exp2_desc: Automation of financial reports and development of dashboards for the purchasing area, improving decision-making efficiency by 40%.
